title: New item concept: Spirit Charm
body:
This would be meant to ill the same role for AP junglers that {{item:3751}} does for tanks, and also ix part of the problem with {{item:3508}}, which is by the time you get the mana passive the part of the game where it would have helped is pretty much over. If you have any alternate suggestions post them below.

8% lifesteal
10% cooldown reduction
unique passive: Leech: restored 1-3% of damage dealt by basic attacks as mana, doubled vs monsters

builds into 
{{item:3508}} and {{item:3708}}

Magus new stats
+80 ability power
+15 magic penetration
+20% cooldown reduction
Unique passive: Leech: Basic attacks and abilities restore 2-8% of the damage dealt as mana.

replies.body: not all AP Mages uses Mana... so I think that's why Magus Enchantment doesn't have Mana or Mana Regen... so the ones who Manaless or uses Health or Energy could uses it too...

How many junglers that would buy Magus don't have mana though? {{champion:84}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:8}} and {{champion:55}} aren't being used in the jungle, {{champion:76}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:30}} could all use this though

magic pen and CDR are extremely powerful o-o 
And isnt the passive why spirit stone was removed?

I think it might have been more about the health than the mana with spirit stone, also it already had the CDR, the magic pen is more for junglers that rely on base damages rather than scaling and it's only a flat amount, basically just to free junglers who would normally buy sorc shoes up to get mobis or merc treads.

That.. would be a hefty nerf to Magus. 40 AP may not sound like a lot, but since you HAVE to get the jungle item when you play jungle and you look at every other AP item, it would put it below Athene's and that's pretty bad.
I originally halved it because of a secondary passive that I had added that seemed like it might have been OP, I should probably put it back up to 80
